topics.body:
God damn it; I knew this was going to happen.  People are already rejecting the woman's sex drive pill.


No offense to anyone that describes them as "liberal" or "democrat", but when it comes to certain medication liberals sure aren't liberal when it comes to medication.  Right now they're slowly finding medication to treat sexual diseases and complications and the current generation is rejecting it.


That just kind of how things are when you think about it: young ones start off calling themselves liberals but then when they become adults and they constitute the new norm the paradigm shifts and as a result they become conservative.

Basically:
When people are young, "Smash the 'man'!"
When they get old, "Stop the whippersnappers before they change society anymore!"

My guess is that 20-35 year old currently in say twenty years will be anti-medicine, anti-biomechatronics, anti-synthesized organic matter, etc, etc and that will probably become the new social issue of people wanting cures for say cancer, aids or such to be criminalized for being "unnatural".
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55753a6b6368727881004b04#post_55753a6b6368727881004b04
[bq="hype"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5575399a63687213ff000e82#post_5575399a63687213ff000e82
why would anyone reject a chicks version of viagra, it seems harmless enough to me[/bq]
Cause they think it's morally wrong. . . sound familiar?


Personally I think in say 20 years they'll have cures for all the stds, stuff like cancer, able to regrow limbs and that but people that are currently in the 20-35 year range will reject it and be riddled with disease whereas young adults then hiv will be practically unheard of.


Disgusting side note:
[spoiler]
You know how in old folks homes there's a disgusting smell all the time?  That smell is the smell of people getting all sorts of contagious diseases that are preventable.  For some reason people have a habit of only accepting medicine that was developed when they were young.  Old folk home smell is the smell of gonorrhea, syphilis and stuff like that.
[/spoiler]

"@Background Pony #E4FF":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557544d16368724b52004663#post_557544d16368724b52004663
Just a long term thing that probably won't for decades go anywhere, *BUT* nasa has for about half a decade been looking at using a medicine to cause the immune system to attack damaged cells due to radiation.

The obvious reason it that in a couple decades you would be able to soak up much more radiation, just pop a pill and your immune system would attack cells that have been damaged due to it.  Obviously we're not talking hugging a nuke levels, but a drastic improvement.

The other thing is that sort of medicine could be applied to aging as well.

topics.body: Here is a nightmarish thought for you, the TMNT's mutations have made them all around far superior to a normal turtle with no draw backs, Turtles don't naturally age like most animals, they could well live to see April's great great great grandchildren die of old age and still be functionally mid twenty year olds, Leo and Donny will be ok, but Raph and Mikey........
